message:
1823952{:}Hello everyone and thank you for updating to version 0.4.0!
This message tab will be used for asset messages and broadcasts in a future update, but I figured it would also be a good place to put important developer messages.
If you do not wish to receive these messages, you may disable them by going to:
Tools>Preferences>Messages
If you do not wish to see this tab, you can disable it by going to:
View>Hide Messages
